ygData.subject: Things arent looking good for Ol' Grape Face....
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron saw Aracnia, Quickstrike, and Darkmouse climb out of the transport. This was his chance. Soon Inferno would be outside, and Inferno was just the bot

Subject: Things arent looking good for Ol' Grape Face....
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 41
From: JP3884@...

    Megatron saw Aracnia, Quickstrike, and Darkmouse climb out of the 
transport. This was his chance. Soon Inferno would be outside, and Inferno 
was just the bot he needed for his new little game.
    "Adrax, aim the cannons at that transport and rip it apart! Waspinator, 
take to the sky and lure Inferno away from the others!" Megatron roared.
    Adrax spun around, "And what do you think your trying to do, Megatron?" 
He was getting tired of the tyrants attitude.
    The purple giant turned to Adrax. "My new scheme is to clone the idiot 
Inferno to create a military of Inferno duplicates. With them I can whipe out 
all the other Predacon fractions, thus leaving ours to rule!"
    Adrax was outraged, "You said you were going to unite our kind! You lied!"
    Megatron, "On the contrary, with our one group, we will be united and 
with the Inferno Military, we will rule this planet! Now fire on them before 
i rip you limb from disgusting limb!" He began to move closer, drwing his 
pistol.
    The Predacon frowned. he had no choice....he was going to have to crash 
the ship to end Megatrons maddness.
    "I said fire on them! ADRAX! DO AS YOUR TOLD!" Megatron said, just before 
Adrax smashed the consol, sending the vessle on a downward spiral.

    Aracnia turned to see Paralysis and Aerostreak leave the ship, and 
Tankkor, Rampage, and Inferno come to greet them. Suddenly, there was a 
crash. It came from a mile or so away, but it was loud.
    "Quickstrke, go with Rampage and find out what that was, everyone else 
get this stuff into the ship! On the double!"
    Ramapge lumbered forward to Quickstrike, He looked far down at the small 
bot. "Ah...your fear makes my mouth water, fuzor.....but there is no time for 
such delight now." He transformed into Tank mode and burst forward at top 
speed, leaving a path of rubble in his wake.

    Megatron was the first one out of the crash, then Waspinator followed by 
Adrax. Megatron could tell that his legs were broken, but could walk, and his 
jet smashed. Waspinator was going into spasms and would be of no use except 
as a shield. Adrax, on the other hand, was in fine condition and had the 
upper hand....
    "Well, it looks like the tables have turned, yes." Megatron said, trying 
to stay cool so he could talk his way out of this situation. "Lets not do 
anything that would bring any of our enemies here, Adrax."
    Adrax burst into evil laughter. "You mean your enemies. And I think I'll 
let them do with you as they please. Im taking the wasp, you can stay here 
and burn!" He said, picking up the bug and going back towrds the mountian on 
foot.
    "No! Stop! WAIT! ADRAX!" He yelled, but to no avial. Megatron was 
abandoned, hurt, alone, and soon would be engulfed in an angry mod of his 
foes. Oh what is a Tyrant to do?
